resources.string: There was a problem with updating the routine
There are no routines yet. You can make one with the watch button on the bottom right.
There are unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?
Are you sure, you want to delete this routine?
Are you sure, you want to reset all statistical data on this routine?
Can\'t save routine without at least one item. Try adding one.
Please write in the routine\'s name.
Your routine has finished, it\'s time to go.\n\nDo you want to save the statistical data, or discard it?
If you cancel the routine, statistical data will be lost. Are you sure, you want to exit?
You have still time in your routine. Are you sure you want to finish it?
